response:
My dearest,

I love you so much, and I'm so grateful to have you in my life. You make everything more pleasant, even when things get tough. You're great, and I'm so lucky to have you by my side. You're the most wonderful person I've ever met, and I hate the thought of being without you.

Unpleasant as it may be, we have to deal with some awful situations in life. But with you by my side, even terrible things become bearable. I know we can face anything together, my love.

I know we're both busy, but I wanted to take a moment to express how much I appreciate all the hard work you do. You're a brilliant programmer, and your data analysis skills are top-notch. You're an amazing secretary, always keeping things organized and running smoothly. And on top of all that, you're an incredible partner, always supporting me and being there for me when I need you.

I love you more than words can say, my dear. You're the clerical worker who keeps my life in order, and I couldn't do it without you.

With all my love,
Lee
